title: [數學] 想請教一下咁樣prove可唔可以呢?~

replies.msg:
第2題

Step 1
point out題目係equivalent to "showing that any lattice point P(x,y) on rect. coord. plane has unique distance d with A(sqrt2,1/3)

Step 2
for any fixed x coord. of P, prove d is unique for all different y coord.

Step 3
d^2 = (x-sqrt2)^2 + (y-1/3)^2
expanding RHS, only irrational term = -2srqt2 × x
so from LHS, x = irrational term on LHS / (-2sqrt2)
so a unique d is given for certain x

Step 4
by step 2, for certain x, and varying y, unique d is given => proven proposition in step 1

求各位賜教

唔明step 4
點解prove fix x, vary y會imply vary x, vary y?
如果個centre point轉左做(1/3,0), fix x, vary y會true, 但vary x fix y會false

可以直接assume if lattice point (a,b), (c,d) distinct, and distance from (sqtr2,1/3) same, 然後contradiction

(a-sqtr2)^2+(b-1/3)^2=(c-sqtr2)^2+(d-1/3)^2
(a-c)(a+b-2sqtr2)=(d-b)(d+b+2/3)
因為左右都唔0，左邊irrational, 右邊rational，contradiction
